notes: High-scale e-commerce platform with international reach. Expecting significant growth in next 12 months.

characteristics.name: Availability
characteristics.description: The ability of a system to be accessible and operational when required.
characteristics.notes: 99.99% uptime required per SLA. Must handle planned maintenance without downtime.

characteristics.name: Scalability
characteristics.description: The ability to handle increased workload by adding resources.
characteristics.notes: Must handle 10x traffic during Black Friday. Auto-scaling required.

characteristics.name: Performance
characteristics.description: The speed and efficiency of the system in executing tasks.
characteristics.notes: Page load under 2s, checkout under 3s. P95 response time < 500ms.

characteristics.name: Security
characteristics.description: The ability to protect data and functionality from unauthorized access.
characteristics.notes: PCI-DSS compliance required for payment processing. GDPR for EU customers.

characteristics.name: Reliability
characteristics.description: The ability to function correctly and consistently over time.
characteristics.notes: Order processing must be reliable. No lost transactions.

characteristics.name: Maintainability
characteristics.description: The ease with which a system can be modified, updated, or repaired.
characteristics.notes: Need to support rapid feature development. Code quality is priority.

characteristics.name: Testability
characteristics.description: The ease with which the system can be tested for defects.
characteristics.notes: Automated testing required. 80% code coverage target.

characteristics.name: Deployability
characteristics.description: The ease and frequency with which the system can be deployed.
characteristics.notes: Multiple deployments per day. CI/CD pipeline essential.

characteristics.name: Fault Tolerance
characteristics.description: The ability to continue operating despite failures in components.
characteristics.notes: Single component failure should not bring down system. Circuit breakers needed.

characteristics.name: Recoverability
characteristics.description: The ability to restore functionality after a failure.
characteristics.notes: RTO: 4 hours, RPO: 1 hour for critical data.

characteristics.name: Interoperability
characteristics.description: The ability to exchange data and interact with other systems.
characteristics.notes: Must integrate with payment gateway, shipping providers, and inventory systems.

characteristics.name: Configurability
characteristics.description: The ease with which system behavior can be changed through configuration.
characteristics.notes: Feature flags for A/B testing. Environment-specific configurations.

characteristics.name: Extensibility
characteristics.description: The ease with which new functionality can be added.
characteristics.notes: Need to add new payment methods and shipping options regularly.

characteristics.name: Usability
characteristics.description: The ease of use and user experience of the system.
